mapper.select: select * from WEBAPI.TPMS_MAT_STRI where SERIAL_NUMBER > #{p1} and SERIAL_NUMBER < = (#{p1} + #{p2}) order by TID
mapper.insert: insert into WEBAPI.TPMS_MAT_STRI (TID, SERIAL_NUMBER, FACTORY_CO, FACTORY_NAME, DC_MATERIAL_NO, SVW_MATERIAL_NO, MIN_SAFETY_STOCK, MAX_SAFETY_STOCK, REF_PRICE, TOTAL_INVENTORY, SHARING, SAFETY_ID, PLACE_OF_PRODUCTION, TOTAL_COLLECTION, ANNUAL_CONSUMPTION, ANNUAL_COLLECTION_TIMES, HISTORICAL_COLLECTION_QUANTITY, MATERIAL_ATTRIBUTE, REMARKS, ATTRIBUTE, PHOTO, PURCHASE_CYCLE) values (TPMS_MAT_STRI_ID.nextval, ( select serial_number+1 from tpms_mat_stri where tid = (select max(tid) from tpms_mat_stri)), #{factoryCo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dcMaterialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svwMaterialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minSafetyStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxSafetyStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{refPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalInventory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sharing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{placeOfProduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalCollection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualConsumption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{annualCollectionTimes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historicalCollectionQuantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialAttribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseCycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.sql: TID, SERIAL_NUMBER, FACTORY_CO, FACTORY_NAME, DC_MATERIAL_NO, SVW_MATERIAL_NO, MIN_SAFETY_STOCK, MAX_SAFETY_STOCK, REF_PRICE, TOTAL_INVENTORY, SHARING, SAFETY_ID, PLACE_OF_PRODUCTION, TOTAL_COLLECTION, ANNUAL_CONSUMPTION, ANNUAL_COLLECTION_TIMES, HISTORICAL_COLLECTION_QUANTITY, MATERIAL_ATTRIBUTE, REMARKS, `ATTRIBUTE`, PHOTO, PURCHASE_CYCLE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from WEBAPI.TPMS_MAT_STRI
order by ${orderByClause}

SERIAL_NUMBER = #{record.serialNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
